name: The Midnight Ride
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam 165.

All art assets : Kenney.

Monster sound : MATRIXXX, attribution license.

##########################################

Welcome to The Midnight Ride!

There are strange creatures lurking in the woods, and your old beat-up car won't last last in the world of living... and neither will you if it breaks down.

Drive to the end of the road and try to escape!

##########################################

CONTROLS :

Enter the car before leaving. It's too dangerous to walk alone.

Arrow keys to drive.

Avoid obstacles or you'll damage the car.

When the car breaks down, mash the corresponding key to repair it. Be quick!
